title: Enable Mermaid architecture-beta diagrams with Iconify icons on docs site
description:
Configured mkdocs-material to render Mermaid architecture-beta diagrams with Iconify icons (logos: and mdi: prefixes).

Key changes:
- mkdocs.yml: Use mermaid-raw class to prevent auto-processing
- docs-site/javascripts/mermaid-config.js: Load and register Iconify icon packs
- Pre-load icons before mermaid.run() to ensure availability
- Transform pre.mermaid-raw > code to div.mermaid for rendering

Icons render on docs site only (requires JS execution). GitHub markdown shows raw syntax.

Diagrams updated:
- docs-site/architecture.md (7 diagrams with tech stack docs)
- AGENTS.md (Three Layers diagram)
